name: Draitron Asterism
text: During the Main Phase: Target 1 "Draitron" monster or 1 Ritual Monster you control, and 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; until the end of your opponent's turn, the target you control loses exactly 1000 ATK, and if it does, destroy that opponent's monster. You can only activate 1 "Draitron Asterism" per turn.
